item.title: How to close an interface
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Get_Forgotten:

c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); add that into the code at the end where you want it to close the interface

thanx :D:D:D
only problem is now that you can mass click and get 3 rewards, shall i put before getting items?

Read full topic

item.title: How to close an interface
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

case 74108: if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 free slot's to use this feature."); } else { c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().Reward(), 1); c.sendMessage("You Receive Your Misc Items"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); } break;

So it would look like that ^.

Read full topic

item.title: How to close an interface
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

what do i put to close an interface this is my code, i want the interface to close after they get their items

this opens the interface

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null); Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; } } }

case 74108: if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 free slot's to use this feature."); } else { c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().Reward(), 1); c.sendMessage("You Receive Your Misc Items"); } break;

Read full topic
